title: Ukraine & Russian tourists advised to visit Immigration/Emigration office to extend visas
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st): The Cabinet recently decided to extend the visa period of Ukrainian and Russian tourists staying in Sri Lanka owing to the Russia-Ukraine crisis.
Accordingly, tourists have been advised to either visit the Immigration and Emigration office in person or to extend their visa online.
In accordance with the Cabinet decision, tourists whose visa is expiring by 2022.02.28 have been granted one month period of extension until 2022.05.22.
